events.message: The insured reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light on March 30th.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords found in the initial report.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to manage the case and provide support.
The insured received official acknowledgement of the claim submission and next steps were outlined.
Additional documents requested including police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
The insured uploaded all requested documentation, including detailed images and police documentation.
An internal review has commenced to verify all submitted documentation and assess liability factors.
The accident investigation has concluded with determination of fault being assigned to the other driver.
A settlement proposal covering all damages and medical expenses was sent to the claimant for review.
The insured responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and proposed settlement.
Claim approval was finalized after all conditions were confirmed and agreed upon by involved parties.
Settlement payment was issued electronically to the claimantâ€™s account without delay or complication.
The insurance claim was officially closed following successful settlement and receipt confirmation.
All documentation and records of the claim have been archived securely for future reference and compliance.
